content.title: The first use of a hyperloop will be incredibly boring - Fast Company
content.desc: Hyperloop Transportation Technologies, which has received far less fanfare then its similarly named competitor Virgin Hyperloop (née Hyperloop One), today announced a joint venture with a German logistics and transportation company that runs container terminals. Together the two companies will bring HTT’s technology to the Port of Hamburg. Which is to say, the first real use of a hyperloop will be to move freight around a shipyard. Not terribly sexy! Of course, this was always going to be the first use case for this still largely untested transportation method. While many hyperloop hopefuls...
